basics.name: Martin donadieu
basics.label: üéôPodcaster | üèÑ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èCTO | üöÄEntrepreneur | üßû‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Life Goal : Make 20% of the world 20% happier #people #happiness
basics.summary: Entrepreneur in love with new technologies! I think they allow us to stay focused on the core business of the company and save valuable time, which is why I chose developer studies at Epitech which gave me the tools to transform a Idea in project effectively.  Startup guy in soul, I would like to build the new disruption of tomorrow. I particularly appreciate the sharing economy sector.  Currently obsessed with Angularjs, Nodejs, Firebase and Ionic. I firmly believe that these are the most suitable technologies for the startup world.  With a good team spirit and my overall vision of the objectives, I am able to lead projects, this position in a team stimulates me and allows me to question myself every day. In order to satisfy my need to learn, my adaptability and my creativity, I need an innovative and exciting environment .  I dream of a world where each person could benefit from the same UX with the best quality without worrying about the terminal it owns.

highlights: JupyterLab increased by our library, which allows among other things to automate (CRON) and call notebooks via API
Deploy with kubernet on AWS

I joined Toucan Toco first engineer for quality assurance (QA), my goal was to set up, good practice of testing and test automation, it was a particular challenge because Toucan Toco is a fully configurable solution .
This mission I failed, End-to-End testing, in a non-constant environment is a big challenge, in addition to the human challenge that it represents to engage people on in-depth testing.

work.summary: We can help turn your idea into reality with a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) for mobile or web. Save time, money and risk with a streamlined version of your product featuring just the core features, so you can test it with your target audience or pitch it directly to investors. We build systems that can be scaled up so you can gain valuable insight and funding to develop further. It‚Äôs time to find out just how strong your idea is.
highlights: Created Captime crossfit timer + 20K download paid app
Successfully launch Fairw.ai chat platform for sales
Started french podcast (INDIE MAKERS) around bootstrapping +5k listener

More than 2000 active users per month.

references.name: Ghislain Bourgin
references.reference:
Martin is the technical cornerstone that allowed us to build and iterate to get You2You from a Google Sheet to a viable app in the Appstore, actually delivering thousands of parcels.
He's a self-driven individual that will be best engaged when constantly fed with new projects and opportunities of learning.
